label: Active
description: The card is active and is able to use for normal transactions.

label: Blocked
description: The card has been placed in a blocked state, probably due to a negative status with the accountholder.

label: Closed
description: The card has been closed (or cancelled) by an account administrator or by request of the accountholder.

label: Damaged
description: The card associated was damaged and cannot be used. So the account is closed because of it.

label: Expired
description: The card is past the expiry date. Expired cards effectively deactivated.

label: Inactive
description: The card has been issued, but the Accountholder has not activated the card yet.

label: Lost
description: The card associated was lost. So the account is closed because of it.

label: Tester
description: The card account is for testing purposes only.
